name: Death end re;Quest DLC Bundle
description:
With a little help from some DLC, you can reach Odyssia in no time! 

The DLC Bundle includes:
  • Death end re;Quest
  • Additional Character: Ripuka
  • Dungeon re;Quest Pack
  • Rook's Traveler Set
  • Rook's Warrior Set
  • Alternate Costume Set
  • Early Bird Special
  • Healing Item Set
